com.syntax.manage

Class SyntaxHighlighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.LayeredHighlighter
      • javax.swing.text.DefaultHighlighter
        • com.syntax.manage.SyntaxHighlighter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SyntaxHighlightingTool, javax.swing.text.Highlighter

    public class SyntaxHighlighter
extends javax.swing.text.DefaultHighlighter
implements SyntaxHighlightingTool
    Implement SyntaxHighlightingTool to support highlighting on SyntaxTextArea
    See Also:
    SyntaxHighlightingTool, SyntaxTextArea

        Returns:
        Highlight of this action
        Throws:

      • syntaxHighlight

        public SyntaxHighlightingTool.SyntaxHighlight syntaxHighlight(int start,
                                                              int end,
                                                              java.awt.Color color)
                                                       throws SyntaxException
        Highlight text in range of [start, end] with specified color
        Specified by:
        syntaxHighlight in interface SyntaxHighlightingTool
        Parameters:
        start - starting position of highlighting
        end - ending position of highlighting
        color - highlighting color
        Returns:
        reprsentation of this action which is used to remove highlight
        Throws:
        SyntaxException - if start > end or at least one of them is out of range in SyntaxTextArea
        See Also:
        removeHighlight(com.syntax.manage.SyntaxHighlightingTool.SyntaxHighlight)

      • getAllHighlights

        public SyntaxHighlightingTool.SyntaxHighlight[] getAllHighlights()
        Get all highlights showed on SyntaxTextArea. The return array doesn't contain highlight made by caret selection. If you want to disable caret selection highlighting, you should use setSelectionEnable(boolean)
        Specified by:
        getAllHighlights in interface SyntaxHighlightingTool
        Returns:
        all highlights added by syntaxHighlight(int,int,Color)

        Parameters:

      • removeAllHighlights

        public void removeAllHighlights(boolean removeSelection)
        Remove all highlights added by syntaxHighlight(int,int,Color)
        Specified by:
        removeAllHighlights in interface SyntaxHighlightingTool
        Parameters:
        removeSelection - true to remove selection highlighting, false not to remove selection highlighting
